categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Lio" was the nickname of a male Human clone of the Mandalorian bounty hunter Jango Fett. The clone trooper was born and trained on the planet Kamino to serve the Galactic Republic as a clone commando in the Clone Wars, an inter-galactic war which raged between 22 and 19 BBY. At some time during the war Lio was killed. He was later mourned by the Mandalorian training sergeants Kal Skirata and Walon Vau.
Like his clone imprint, Lio was 1.83 meters tall.
The clone commando Lio was first mentioned in Order 66, a novel written by Karen Traviss and published in September 2009.
